		INSERT INTO erp_member(
 				userid
				, userpw
				, userstatus
				, userdepartment
				, userstate
				, name
				, phonenumber
				, email
				, address
				,loginstate
		)
		VALUES(
 				#{userid}
				, #{userpw}
				, #{userstatus}
				, #{userdepartment}
				, 'notallowed'
				, #{name}
				, #{phonenumber}
				, #{email}
				, #{address}		
 				, 'out'
		)
	
		
		SELECT  userid
				, userpw
				, userstate
		FROM erp_member
		WHERE userid=#{userid}
